snippet: Bud Selig, long a replay opponent, says he expects the plan to be in effect for the 2014 season, which he has said will be his last as commissioner.
lead_paragraph: Bud Selig, long a replay opponent, says he expects the plan to be in effect for the 2014 season, which he has said will be his last as commissioner.

headline.main: Team Owners Approve Funding for Expanded Use of Instant Replay
headline.print_headline: Team Owners Approve Funding for Expanded Use of Instant Replay
